testimonials.text: I have been consistently impressed by both Jimmy's attitude towards his work and his performance on the job. Jimmy is a very responsible person. His strong customer-oriented mind and helpful attitude are well appreciated by the users supported by him.
testimonials.user: Simon Wong - Senior Application Manager at Intertek Testing Services HK Ltd.

testimonials.text: Jimmy Wan is a living example of ''Self-Performance  management to drive operational Xcellence''.
testimonials.user: Andr√© Lacroix - CEO at Intertek Group

testimonials.text: Jimmy showed initiative to learn quickly and was able to complete his assignments on time. I would recommend Jimmy to any potential employer.
testimonials.user: Sunny Ho - Software Development Manager at VHSoft Technologies Co., Ltd.
